oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |a!kunta (Stoffel) (I) (and possibly ||kabbo)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Of what appears to be an Incantation, reciting the names of different animals successively, we have several versions, -three by /a!kunta alone. (B I. 249...) |xam words and sentences (the names of animals). 1) This story is found in Book I.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilhelm Bleek notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: names of animals
